post_text:
We want to thank you all for turning in your iPads over 3 days. We collected 99% of our iPads which is amazing, so thank you again.

Yearbooks will be delivered sometime this summer. Lifetouch laid off many of their employees during the stay at home order which put everything behind. We will have everyone‚Äôs yearbook for you in August. We will make sure 6th-grade students yearbooks get delivered to the middle school.

Again thank you all for turning in your iPad during our drop off days, we hope you all have a wonderful summer.

post_text:
Just a reminder this week is the iPad drop off.

Students in grades 2-6 will follow this iPad drop-off schedule:
2nd Grade May 13th AM (9-11)
3rd Grade May 13th PM (1-3)
4th Grade May 14th AM (9-11)
5th Grade May 14th PM (1-3) Fifth-grade t-shirt money will be returned.
6th Grade May 15th AM (9-11) Cedar Point money will be returned on this day. 6th Grade students will keep their chargers!

Fundraiser items will be delivered with your classroom items.

Please remember to bring a pen with you.

More information and q drop off map can be found here:
https://www.northmontschools.com/6/News/1334#sthash.KxGqAMOT.Pr2fBdEq.dpbs

Fundraiser update:
The product from our Nut/candy fundraiser is being held by Trophy Nut Company at their warehouse. We will request our product once we return to school and update everyone with a pickup/send home date.

Our pretzel sale product will be made fresh for use once we return and sent a date to receive the pretzels. Once we have a date we will let you know.

post_text:
We wanted to updated everyone on a few things.

Our pretzel sale will continue after we return. You may still send in orders tomorrow. We will announce a new delivery date once we have a date set.

Our nut/candy sale will be delivered once we return to school. We are working with fundraiser company to get a date.

We are working with Lifetouch to setup a new date for spring pictures. We will update everyone soon.

Our 4-6th Grade dance has been canceled. Refunds have been issued.

PBIS Q3 reward will be rescheduled.

post_text: Last week your child should have brought the above paper home regarding our Veterans Day activities at school. We need these papers returned by tomorrow (Monday, November 4). Our Veterans Day breakfast is Monday, November 11th and we would like to send those invitations out by midweek this week. The only way we will be able to do that is if ALL Veterans Day Information sheets are turned in tomorrow. If your child‚Äôs favorite veteran cannot attend the breakfast, that is totally okay. We will still honor her or him in our hallway displays this week. If for some reason this paper did not come home, please just send a message, note, or email with all of the above information to your child‚Äôs teacher tomorrow. It‚Äôs really important to check the box at the bottom of the form of your child‚Äôs favorite veteran is going to attend our Veterans Day breakfast on November 11th. Thank you for your understanding and consideration. More importantly, we thank all veterans and active service military personnel for their service to our great country.
text: Last week your child should have brought the above paper home regarding our Veterans Day activities at school. We need these papers returned by tomorrow (Monday, November 4). Our Veterans Day breakfast is Monday, November 11th and we would like to send those invitations out by midweek this week. The only way we will be able to do that is if ALL Veterans Day Information sheets are turned in tomorrow. If your child‚Äôs favorite veteran cannot attend the breakfast, that is totally okay. We will still honor her or him in our hallway displays this week. If for some reason this paper did not come home, please just send a message, note, or email with all of the above information to your child‚Äôs teacher tomorrow. It‚Äôs really important to check the box at the bottom of the form of your child‚Äôs favorite veteran is going to attend our Veterans Day breakfast on November 11th. Thank you for your understanding and consideration. More importantly, we thank all veterans and active service military personnel for their service to our great country.

post_text: Our annual Harvest Parade followed by classroom parties will be tomorrow Thursday, October 31st. Students are permitted to dress up for our parade please make sure all customs are school appropriate. The parade, weather permitting, is scheduled to begin at 2:15 p.m. We hope you can come join us along the parade route will be down the school drive to Martindale to Draper to Hollycrest back to the school.

post_text: A big thank you to SRO Jones and Union‚Äôs first responders for helping with our evacuation drill this morning.
text: A big thank you to SRO Jones and Union‚Äôs first responders for helping with our evacuation drill this morning.

post_text: Tomorrow we will be practicing a full-scale evacuation drill with our staff and students. Updated safety measures in Ohio schools have expanded the emergency management test requirements which now includes conducting a full-scale evacuation drill every 3 years. The full-scale safety drill will include students and staff evacuating to the City of Union Service Center for a brief time. Please be aware that the first responders will be on-site to assist with the full-scale drill. The full-scale drill starting at 9:30 should last approximately 1 ¬Ω hours.
text: Tomorrow we will be practicing a full-scale evacuation drill with our staff and students. Updated safety measures in Ohio schools have expanded the emergency management test requirements which now includes conducting a full-scale evacuation drill every 3 years. The full-scale safety drill will include students and staff evacuating to the City of Union Service Center for a brief time. Please be aware that the first responders will be on-site to assist with the full-scale drill. The full-scale drill starting at 9:30 should last approximately 1 ¬Ω hours.

post_text:
A few reminders, tomorrow is our BBQ, We hope you can join us.

Our World Famous Sub sale orders and money are due tomorrow, September 20. Orders MUST be paid for when turned in, so we can purchase the supplies needed to make the subs. This is our PTO biggest fundraiser of the year, we are hoping you can help make it a success. Sub pick up will be Friday, October 11, 11:00 AM to 4:30 PM!

PBIS helps Union Elementary students make SmART Choices
Show your support for our student Bolt Buck Store and Quarterly Rewards.
Please visit our donation table at the Fall BBQ. For just $1 you can add your signature to a label that will be placed on our students‚Äô artwork. This will give our students a visual reminder of your partnership with us. The monochromatic student
art display will be hanging in the hallway that students pass multiple times each day.
(PBIS stands for Positive Behavior Interventions & Supports)
All money collected will go towards the purchase Bolt Buck Store items for our students.

shared_text:
Northmont City Schools
July 13, 2019 at 8:17 AM ¬∑

YMCA Before and After Care Program

Northmont has partnered with YMCA to expand the high quality before and after school program to all five elementary schools for the 2019-2020 school year, that has been running very successfully at the Kleptz Early Learning Center. Open houses will be held at each elementary during the week of July 23-25. Check our website for updates throughout this summer, and see current information listed below:

ENROLLMENT PACKETS for the 2019-2020 School Year are now available at the Front Desk of the Kleptz YMCA, and at the Northmont District office at 4001 Old Salem Rd.

The packet MUST be completed in full and returned before your child is considered‚Ä¶

Want to help your child's school?
Use your Kroger Plus Card and help us grow! You‚Äôll start earning rewards for our organization right away on qualifying purchases made using your Kroger Plus Card!

Learn more at www.KrogerCommunityRewards.com

How to Sign up:
1. Visit www.KrogerCommunityRewards.com
2. Sign in to your online account (the same one you may use to clip coupons or shop through the Clicklist), or create an account
3. Find and select your organization, and click ‚ÄúEnroll‚Äù
Our Organization name is:
Union Elementary Parent Teacher Organization
Our Number is #DM933 ‚Üê-- searching by this number is the best way to find our group.

This fundraiser costs you nothing but could help our PTO‚Ä¶

post_text:
Due to extreme cold temperatures, Northmont City Schools will be closed on Thursday, January 31, 2019.
We will reassess at noon Thursday to determine whether evening activities will proceed as scheduled.
